channel.title: Nexus 718 Run
channel.description:
Hey I'm getting some weird thing. I wanted to play around with Nexus 718 and just have fun with a few friends. But I was getting the Could create VM thingy. But then I used someone else's run and now when I run it says. [code][Nexus] Server is loading.. Press any key to continue[/code]
My Run.bat [code]@title Running Nexus @echo off echo [Nexus] Server is loading.. START java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause[/code]
So if anyone could help that would be great!

item.title: Nexus 718 Run
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

You’re suppressing errors with those options. I told you that. The first one tells you that there’s not enough memory.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus 718 Run
item.dc:creator: @Felon Felon
item.description:
@Felon wrote:

[quote=“V 1 N C H, post:3, topic:465225”]This is mine, and it works fine for me: @title Running Nexus @echo off echo [Nexus] Server is loading.. java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

Though I think they’re the same.[/quote]
Wow I’m stupid lol. my computer can’t run 4096m, but for some reason this Run.bat doesn’t tell me that. Thanks for help both!

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus 718 Run
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

This is mine, and it works fine for me: @title Running Nexus @echo off echo [Nexus] Server is loading.. java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

Though I think they’re the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus 718 Run
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

The could not create VM error occurs when you try to allocate more memory than you can spare. Revert back to your original command line - I believe the one you changed it to is suppressing the error. On the original command line, try setting the -Xmx (maximum memory) and -Xms (minimum memory) to lower values.

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus 718 Run
item.dc:creator: @Felon Felon
item.description:
@Felon wrote:

Hey I’m getting some weird thing. I wanted to play around with Nexus 718 and just have fun with a few friends. But I was getting the Could create VM thingy. But then I used someone else’s run and now when I run it says.

[Nexus] Server is loading.. Press any key to continue

My Run.bat

@title Running Nexus @echo off echo [Nexus] Server is loading.. START java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

So if anyone could help that would be great!

Read full topic
